ygData.subject: RE: Lava & Corpses  was  Bard Handicap of Sorts
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You can drag stuff out of lava anywhere else in Sol A (you may have to get creative with your levitate, but you can do it). It s just the section past that
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 7 Dec 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> I died in the lava - fell off the ramp running to zone on first visit to
> that place. My wiz fiend levi'd over and dragged it out - I was rezzed and
> looted it at the zone - but boy was I nervous while sitting in Rivervale
> waiting for them to get it. She musta blindly clicked until she got it
> targeted. I consented and she dragged. She might have pulled it to a place
> where Z-axis effect can pull it up to the top, zoned out, then /corpsed it
> up to the top. (We /corpsed one from the bottom of HH canyon straight up to
> the top ledge one time.)

You can drag stuff out of lava anywhere else in Sol A (you may
have to get creative with your levitate, but you can do it).
It's just the section past that lavafall where you can't pull
it out.

> p.s. some one mentioned that you can zone out from the lava pool into Sol-b?
> Does that mean that if you were to zone from sol-b you would end up in Lava
> if you were not levi'd when you zoned? Like someone could zone out of sol-b
> in panic and die in the lava?

That particular zone point goes from lava to lava. I spent
the better part of an hour (my first hour ever in Sol B mind
you) finding a friend's corpse after he fell in in Sol A,
zoned through to Sol B, and died. We had no idea where in
that lava zone came out in Sol B, and I had to rely on the
song to figure out where his corpse was. (I was not attacked
the entire time, and figured Sol B wasn't so bad so decided to
play there a bit, and problem died to a sonic bat train. :-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
